content: this quick and easy crochet scarf with tassels pattern is great for beginners learning how to crochet a scarf the pattern is made from two simple stitches but creates a beautiful textured and modern scarf that you will be proud to wear or give as a gift the pattern includes a full video tutorial about this pattern - it s a very easy pattern great for beginners - it includes step-by-step instructions with pictures on how to make and attach the scarf tassels - you can easily adjust the size - you can use any medium/worsted weight size 4 yarn
